Title for the damage display settings

This lets the player change the multiplier for the classic red screen tint when they take damage. If they prefer to only rely on damage markers as a damage indicator, they may choose to reduce this to 0.

If this is false, inventory bar will auto-hide after 2 seconds and only the currently selected item will be shown.

default:
If inventory bar is always shown, "Use Item" button will instantly use the item.
If not, first press will select the item, second press will use it.
remarks: Keep under 2 lines! (Use actual linebreak to separate them, there's no autowrapping)
ru:
Если полоса предметов всегда включена, кнопка "Использовать предмет" сразу использует его.
В противном случае первое нажатие выбирает предмет, а второе использует.
pt:
Se a barra de inventário estiver sempre mostrando,
o botão "Usar item" funciona instantâneamente

remarks: Size of icons in the inventory bar (absolute pixel value)

default:
Note: Inventory bar will only appear in games/mods that have
items that can be placed in inventory and used from it.
remarks: Keep under 2 lines! (Use actual linebreak to separate them, there's no autowrapping)
ru:
Внимание: полоса предметов отображается, только если в игре/моде
есть предметы, которые можно использовать из инвентаря.
pt:
Obs.: Barra de inventário aparece apenas em jogos/mods
que têm itens que podem ser colocados no inventário.
